      • BoardMechanics

        public BoardMechanics(ConnectFourGame connectFourGame,
                      MainFrame mFrame,
                      int diff,
                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Boolean> cpu_players,
                      int players,
                      boolean isMChrome)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        connectFourGame - ConnectFourGame JFrame object.
        mFrame - Main JFrame to set objects in.
        diff - AI difficulty level.
        cpu_players - Whether there are AI players.
        players - Number of players in this game.
        isMChrome - True if game is in Monochrome, false otherwise.

    • Method Detail

      • dropToken

        public int dropToken(int col)
        Drops in a token into the board.
        Parameters:
        col - Column to insert token
        Returns:
        Puts in a coin for the current player in the board and returns the row number.
        Precondition:
        None.

        public void nextPlayer()
        Switch players.
        Precondition:
        None.
        Postcondition:
        Current player is switched to the other player.

      • checkMoveValid

        public boolean checkMoveValid(int col)
        Checks if the current move attempt is valid.
        Parameters:
        col - The column that the player or computer is attempting to drop a token in.
        Returns:
        valid True if current move is valid, false otherwise.

      • checkForWin

        public boolean checkForWin(boolean isCheck)
        Checks for win at each coin drop at column, col.
        Parameters:
        isCheck - Whether or not it has been currently checked for win; false for not yet.
        Returns:
        0 if there is no win, player number (i.e. 1, 2...) if there is a win.
        Precondition:
        turn is greater than 6.

      • win

        public void win(int player)
        Procedures to follow when game is won.
        Parameters:
        player - Player who won the game.
        Precondition:
        Game is won by a player.
        Postcondition:
        Finishes up the game when game is won; asks if player should be replayed.

        public void restart()
        Restarting the entire game.
        Precondition:

        Postcondition:
        Restarts the game to initial state.
